Package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.eclipse.xml

Class ConfigReader

java.lang.Object
de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.eclipse.xml.ConfigReader
public class ConfigReader
extends java.lang.Object
This class reads a config file for Eclipse code formatter.
Author:
jecki, Matt Blanchette

  • Method Details

    • read

      @NotNull public @NotNull java.util.List<Profile> read​(java.io.File normalizedFile) throws java.io.IOException, org.xml.sax.SAXException, ConfigReadException
      Read from the given File and return it's configuration settings as a List.
      Parameters:
      normalizedFile - the File to read
      Returns:
      return List with all the configurations read from the config file, or throws an exception if there's a problem reading the input, e.g.: invalid XML.
      Throws:
      org.xml.sax.SAXException - if there are parsing issues
      java.io.IOException - if there is a I/O issue
      ConfigReadException - if the given file is not a eclipse formatter template
